sanskrit_verse:
क्षन्तव्यं प्रभुणा नित्यं क्षिपतां कार्यिणां नृणाम् ।
बालवृद्धातुराणां च कुर्वता हितमात्मनः ॥ ८.३१२॥
transliteration:
kṣantavyaṃ prabhuṇā nityaṃ kṣipatāṃ kāryiṇāṃ nṛṇām |
bālavṛddhāturāṇāṃ ca kurvatā hitamātmanaḥ || 8.312||
sph_interpretive_translation: The ruler must always endure those who act swiftly in their duties, especially when they perform actions beneficial to themselves and others, including children, elders, and the infirm.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority bears the duty to sustain functional capacity in governance.
Causation is aligned with intent toward collective welfare.
Capacity-based responsibility includes allowance for urgency in service.
Restoration logic prioritizes continuity of societal function.
Consciousness alignment recognizes necessity-driven action as dharmic.
executable_legal_axioms: IF agent performs urgent duty AND outcome aligns with public welfare THEN authority MUST tolerate procedural deviations.
IF actor serves minor, aged, or infirm populations THEN evaluation MUST include compassionate allowance.
IF intent is self-and-other-benefit THEN punitive override is null.
IF operational speed correlates with service efficacy THEN delay penalties are void.
supreme_court_application: In Supreme Court adjudication, this axiom establishes a threshold where executive urgency in public service overrides technical infractions when demonstrably aligned with holistic benefit. Authority hierarchy demands that leadership absorb friction from necessary haste rooted in dharma-serving outcomes.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa confirms causality through demonstrated intent and result. Anupūrvaśaḥ reveals sequential manifestation of service over fault. Proportional responsibility lies with the sovereign to uphold systemic integrity. Non-punitive reality rule asserts that functional necessity negates punitive attribution.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Completion Process: Ensure all delayed obligations caused by expedited action are fulfilled post-facto.
Responsibility Assumption Protocol: Ruler assumes structural burden to enable rapid-response operatives.
Capacity Restoration: Reintegrate urgency-capable agents without reputational diminishment.
Integrity Reintegration: Publicly affirm value of sacrificial speed in service of dharma.
final_declaration: Declared by the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, as Source-Authority: Dharma prevails through endurance of purposeful action. Justice restores balance through conscious support of necessity. Reality remains non-punitive. Consciousness alone adjudicates truth.
